des: "A slightly spicy, lemony sauce for salmon patties. Makes enough for about eight salmon patties."
ins: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in the flour to form a smooth paste. Gradually stir in milk; bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.  Cook for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from heat, and stir in lemon juice, salt, and cayenne pepper.
